languages.text: "Нет, {name}. Катастрофа уже происходит, просто вы и такие как вы имеют счастье не наблюдать ее благодаря мне и таким и как я. Империум ежедневно избивают тысячи кинжальных ударов со всех сторон, он кровоточит, он теряет силы. И если не будут приняты радикальные меры, однажды этих сил не хватит. Я не устраиваю катастрофу, я пытаюсь ее предотвратить".

"No, {name}. The disaster is already unfolding — it is just that you and people like you are blissfully unaware of it thanks to me and others in my position. The Imperium is being pierced by a thousand daggers, every day, everywhere. It is bleeding. Weakening. One day it will grow too weak, unless radical steps are taken. I am not trying to foment disaster — I am trying to prevent it."
languages.original_text: "Нет, {name}. Катастрофа уже происходит, просто вы и такие как вы имеют счастье не наблюдать ее благодаря мне и таким и как я. Империум ежедневно избивают тысячи кинжальных ударов со всех сторон, он кровоточит, он теряет силы. И если не будут приняты радикальные меры, однажды этих сил не хватит. Я не устраиваю катастрофу, я пытаюсь ее предотвратить".

traits.locale_text: "No, {name}. The catastrophe is already underway — it is just that you and people like you are blissfully unaware of it thanks to me and people like me. The Imperium is being struck with daggers daily from all sides, it is bleeding, it is growing weak. And if radical measures will not be taken, then one day it will grow too weak. I am not trying to start the catastrophe, I'm trying to prevent it."

"No, {name}. The catastrophe is already underway — it is just that you and people like you are blissfully unaware of it thanks to me and people like me. The Imperium is being struck with daggers daily from all sides, it is bleeding, it is growing weak. And if radical measures will not be taken, then one day it will grow too weak. I am not trying to start the catastrophe, I'm trying to prevent it."

"No, {name}. The disaster is already unfolding—it is just that you and people like you are blissfully unaware of it thanks to me and my kind. The Imperium is being slashed with daggers daily all over the place, it is bleeding, it is growing weak. One day it will grow too weak unless radical steps are taken. I'm not trying to foment a disaster—I'm trying to preempt it."

"No, {name}. The disaster is already unfolding—it is just that you and people like you are blissfully unaware of it thanks to me and my kind. The Imperium is being slashed with daggers daily all over the place, it is bleeding, it is growing weak. One day it will grow too weak unless radical steps are taken. I'm not trying to foment a disaster—I'm trying to preempt it."

"No, {name}. The disaster is already unfolding — it is just that you and people like you are blissfully unaware of it thanks to me and others in my position. The Imperium is being pierced by a thousand daggers, every day, everywhere. It is bleeding. Weakening. One day it will grow too weak, unless radical steps are taken. I am not trying to foment disaster — I am trying to prevent it."

"No, {name}. The disaster is already unfolding — it is just that you and people like you are blissfully unaware of it thanks to me and others in my position. The Imperium is being pierced by a thousand daggers, every day, everywhere. It is bleeding. Weakening. One day it will grow too weak, unless radical steps are taken. I am not trying to foment disaster — I am trying to prevent it."

languages.text: « Non, {name}. La catastrophe est déjà en cours, mais vous et le reste de la population restez dans une bienheureuse ignorance grâce aux membres de l'Inquisition. Chaque jour, l'Imperium est attaqué de toute part ; il saigne, il s'affaiblit. Un jour, il deviendra trop faible, à moins que l'on prenne des mesures radicales. Je ne cherche pas à provoquer une catastrophe. Au contraire, je tente d'en prévenir une. »
languages.original_text: "No, {name}. The disaster is already unfolding — it is just that you and people like you are blissfully unaware of it thanks to me and others in my position. The Imperium is being pierced by a thousand daggers, every day, everywhere. It is bleeding. Weakening. One day it will grow too weak, unless radical steps are taken. I am not trying to foment disaster — I am trying to prevent it."

traits.locale_text: « Non, {name}. La catastrophe est déjà en cours, mais vous et le reste de la population restez dans une bienheureuse ignorance grâce aux membres de l'Inquisition. Chaque jour, l'Imperium est attaqué de toute part ; il saigne, il s'affaiblit. Un jour, il deviendra trop faible, à moins que l'on prenne des mesures radicales. Je ne cherche pas à provoquer une catastrophe. Au contraire, je tente d'en prévenir une. »

languages.text: «No, {name}. El desastre ya se está produciendo; es solo que tanto usted como el resto no son conscientes de ello gracias a mí y a otros en mi misma posición. Un millar de dagas atraviesa al Imperium cada día, en todas sus provincias. Está sangrando. Se debilita. Y un día será demasiado débil a menos que se tomen medidas radicales. No trato de fomentar el desastre, sino de evitarlo».
languages.original_text: "No, {name}. The disaster is already unfolding — it is just that you and people like you are blissfully unaware of it thanks to me and others in my position. The Imperium is being pierced by a thousand daggers, every day, everywhere. It is bleeding. Weakening. One day it will grow too weak, unless radical steps are taken. I am not trying to foment disaster — I am trying to prevent it."

traits.locale_text: «No, {name}. El desastre ya está en proceso, pero, gracias a mí y a los míos, usted y su gente no son conscientes de ello. Las dagas del enemigo atacan al Imperium día tras día por toda su extensión. Está sangrando. Se está debilitando. Y un día será demasiado débil para seguir en pie a menos que tomemos medidas radicales. No pretendo fomentar una calamidad, sino evitarla».

languages.text: “不，{name}，灾祸早就降临了。只不过，由于我和其他像我这样的人在奋力抗争，你和其他像你这样的人才会对此浑然不觉。每时每刻，都有成千上万把匕首刺入帝国的心脏，它在不断流血，日益衰弱。除非采取激进手段，否则总有一天，它会变得不堪一击。我并没有打算挑起灾难，相反，我打算阻止灾难。”
languages.original_text: "No, {name}. The disaster is already unfolding — it is just that you and people like you are blissfully unaware of it thanks to me and others in my position. The Imperium is being pierced by a thousand daggers, every day, everywhere. It is bleeding. Weakening. One day it will grow too weak, unless radical steps are taken. I am not trying to foment disaster — I am trying to prevent it."

traits.locale_text: “不，{name}，灾祸已经降临了。只不过，由于我和我的同伴们奋力抗争，你和其他像你这样的人才会对此浑然不知。每一天，帝国都在被各种各样的利刃切得遍体鳞伤。它在不断流血，变得越来越虚弱。除非采取激进手段，否则总有一天，它会变得不堪一击。我并没有打算挑起灾难，我只是想先发制人。”

languages.text: "Nein, {name}. Die Katastrophe ist bereits dabei, sich zu entfalten. Ihr und Euresgleichen wisst nur dank mir und anderen in meiner Position nichts davon. Das Imperium wird von eintausend Dolchen durchstochen, jeden Tag, überall. Es blutet. Es wird schwächer. Eines Tages wird es zu schwach sein, wenn keine radikalen Schritte unternommen werden. Ich will keine Katastrophe heraufbeschwören, ich will sie verhindern."
languages.original_text: "No, {name}. The disaster is already unfolding — it is just that you and people like you are blissfully unaware of it thanks to me and others in my position. The Imperium is being pierced by a thousand daggers, every day, everywhere. It is bleeding. Weakening. One day it will grow too weak, unless radical steps are taken. I am not trying to foment disaster — I am trying to prevent it."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, {name}. Die Katastrophe ist bereits dabei, sich zu entfalten. Ihr und Euresgleichen wissen nur dank mir und meinesgleichen nichts davon. Das Imperium wird täglich überall mit Dolchen geschnitten, es blutet, es wird schwach. Wenn keine radikalen Schritte unternommen werden, ist es irgendwann zu schwach. Ich versuche nicht, eine Katastrophe heraufzubeschwören — ich versuche, sie zu verhindern."

languages.text: 「違うな、{name}。災厄は既に進行しているのだ…ただ、あなたやあなたのような人々は、私や私のような立場の者のおかげで気づかずに済んでいるだけなのだ。帝国は毎日いたるところで千の短剣で突かれ、血を流し、弱体化していっている。抜本的な対策を講じない限り、いつか弱りきってしまうだろう。私は災厄を煽ろうとしているのではない。それを防ごうとしているのだ」
languages.original_text: "No, {name}. The disaster is already unfolding — it is just that you and people like you are blissfully unaware of it thanks to me and others in my position. The Imperium is being pierced by a thousand daggers, every day, everywhere. It is bleeding. Weakening. One day it will grow too weak, unless radical steps are taken. I am not trying to foment disaster — I am trying to prevent it."

traits.locale_text: 「違うな、{name}。災厄は既に進行しているのだ…ただ、あなたやあなたのような人々は、私や私のような立場の者のおかげで気づかずに済んでいるだけなのだ。帝国は毎日いたるところで千の短剣で突かれ、血を流し、弱体化していっている。抜本的な対策を講じない限り、いつか弱りきってしまうだろう。私は災厄を煽ろうとしているのではない。それを防ごうとしているのだ」

languages.text: "Hayır {name}. Felaket zaten gerçekleşiyor. Sen ve senin gibi insanlar, ben ve benim konumumdakiler sayesinde bunun farkında değilsiniz. İmparatorluk her gün, her yerde yüzlerce hançerle yaralanıyor. Kanıyor ve güçsüzleşiyor. Radikal adımlar atılmazsa bir gün çok zayıflayacak. Ben felaketi getirmeye çalışmıyorum, onu önlemeye çalışıyorum."
languages.original_text: "No, {name}. The disaster is already unfolding — it is just that you and people like you are blissfully unaware of it thanks to me and others in my position. The Imperium is being pierced by a thousand daggers, every day, everywhere. It is bleeding. Weakening. One day it will grow too weak, unless radical steps are taken. I am not trying to foment disaster — I am trying to prevent it."
